title: Promoting Educational Equity through Critical Media Literacy: Collaborative Mathematics Pedagogical Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Digital Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Support for flexible learning schedules for working professionals, considering multicultural learners

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze biases embedded in media productions to explain the concept of educational equity
Learners can design mathematics education plans considering learners from diverse backgrounds using collaborative learning tools
Learners can develop digital literacy assessment rubrics and improve them through peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
